question: Strategic tunnel under Rohtang Pass was recently named after which of the following individuals?
explanation: The Government is going to name the strategic tunnel under the Rohtang Pass in Himachal Pradesh after the former PM Atal Bihari Vajpayee. The decision to construct this tunnel was taken during Vajpayee’s tenure. The 8.8 km tunnel will be world’s longest above an altitude of 3,000 meters and it reduces the distance between Leh and Manali.
